title: The schollers purgatory discouered in the Stationers common-wealth, and discribed in a discourse apologeticall, asvvell for the publike aduantage of the Church, the state & vvhole common-vvealth of England, as for the remedy of priuate iniuryes. By Geo: VVither.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Imprinted [by G. Wood] for the honest Stationers,
